contents: Check and see what your degree will be recognise by Engineer Australia as. "电子电气" is probably Electrical Engineer, but that would be dependent on the actual course you have chosen to take during you degree. Electrical Engineer is in a better place than Electronics Engineer because the former is not pro rata and requires a relatively lower score. The immigration situation in Australia is really uncertain at the moment due to the slash of quota last year and the change of policy this November. But if you are determined, than practice your English and try to get band 8 on IELTS or PTE, get your NATTI and if needs be, consider Professional Year or even PHD.
